predicate.note: Frames file for 'consent' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet class Commitment.

example.name: typical usage
example.text: While neither admitting nor denying wrongdoing, Triton and Mr. Chase consented to findings of violations in connection with limited-partnership sales.
example.arg: While neither admitting nor denying wrongdoing
to findings of violations in connection with limited-partnership sales

example.name: infinitive arg1
example.text: Two of Mr. Holmes's business associates who worked for Venture Capitalists, Kimberly Ann Smith and Frederick Byrum, also consented to being enjoined from violations of registration provisions of the securities laws.
example.arg: Two of Mr. Holmes's business associates who worked for Venture Capitalists, Kimberly Ann Smith and Frederick Byrum,
to being enjoined from violations of registration provisions of the securities laws
